name: Employee CTC
query:
Select
DISTINCT sa.name as "Document Number:Link/Salary Structure Assignment:150",
sa.employee as "Employee:data:130",
e.id_number as "ID Number:data:100",
sa.employee_name as "Name:data:130",
sa.salary_structure as "Salary Structure:data:130",
sa.department as "Departmet:data:100",
sd.salary_component as "Salary Component:data:130",
(CASE WHEN sd.parentfield="deductions" THEN 0-sd.amount ELSE sd.amount END) as "Amount:data:130"
from `tabSalary Structure Assignment` sa
LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e
ON e.name=sa.employee
LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Structure` ss
ON ss.name=sa.salary_structure
LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd
ON sd.parent=ss.name
WHERE ss.is_active="Yes"
AND ss.docstatus=1
ORDER BY sa.name ASC
